headline: Synchrony Makes a Big Splash in Connecticut Celebrating a Decade of Polar Plunges to Support Charity
summary: Synchrony (NYSE: SYF) employees, in a heartwarming display of courage and compassion, today braved icy waters at The Point at Norwalk Cove for the tenth consecutive celebration of their annual "Doubles Dive." The goal of the plunge is to raise vital funds for Connecticut-based nonprofit SeriousFun Children's Network, an organization devoted to creating summer camp experiences for children with serious illnesses and medical conditions.

content.title: Synchrony Makes a Big Splash in Connecticut Celebrating a Decade of Polar Plunges to Support Charity

The goal of the plunge is to raise vital funds for Connecticut-based nonprofit SeriousFun Children's Network, an organization devoted to creating summer camp experiences for children with serious illnesses and medical conditions.

thumbnail.caption: Stamford-based Synchrony employees brave icy waters in 10th annual polar plunge to raise money for charity in Connecticut.
